dsDescriptionValue.value: Observed CaK spectra and their deconvolution on basal and plage spectra

publicationCitation.value: Pevtsov, A.A., Bertello, L., Uitenbroek, H.: 2013, "On Possible Variations of Basal Ca II K Chromospheric Line Profiles with the Solar Cycle", Astrophys. J., 767, 56

fields.value: Daily observations of the Ca II K line profiles of the Sun-as-a-star taken with the Integrated Sunlight Spectrometer from 2006 December through 2011 July were used to deconvolve the contributions from the quiet (basal) chromosphere and with magnetic network/plage areas. These profiles are provided in qs_as_ob_profiles_best file.

files.description:
The data file is organized as following:

1. String identifying the name of fits file with the observed spectra (filename contains date of observations).
2. Array of wavelengths (1024 elements, format='(7(F9.5,1x))')
3. Array of intensities for basal profile (1024 elements, format='(6(f10.7,1x))')
4. Array of intensities for plage profile (1024 elements, format='(6(f10.7,1x))')
5. Array of intensities for observed CaK profile (1024 elements, format='(6(f10.7,1x))')

This group of 1-5 entries is repeated for all observations included in the data set.
files.label: qs_as_ob_profiles_best.txt
